Texts.Chs: 用于运输农产品的各种容器。
Texts.Eng: A variety of containers used for shipping produce.

Texts.Chs: 像这样的容器对一堆东西都很有用。
Texts.Eng: Containers like these are useful for a whole heap o' things.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人可以躲在有水果味的盒子里，等待猎物通过。
Texts.Eng: Floran can hide in fruity-smelling boxes and wait for prey to passs.

Texts.Chs: 哦！这箱子里还有淡淡的苹果味。
Texts.Eng: Oh! This crate here still smells faintly of apples.

Texts.Chs: 如此随意的收藏。货主肯定不会错过一两个丢失的集装箱...
Texts.Eng: Such a haphazard collection. Surely the owner won't miss a container or two going missing...

Texts.Chs: 当然，我可以在储存农产品之外找到这些容器的用途。
Texts.Eng: Surely I can find a use for these containers outside of storing produce.

Texts.Chs: 这里有很多坚固的容器。也许我可以用它们做点什么？
Texts.Eng: There's a lot of sturdy containers here. Maybe I can use them for something?

Texts.Chs: 这些板条箱之类的东西是用来生产的，但我想其他任何东西都适合。
Texts.Eng: These crates and such are meant for produce, but I imagine anything else will fit just as well.
